charges.charge_description: T.8, USC Section 1325 (d)-Defendants did knowingly and intentionally establish a commercial enterprise for the purpose of evading a provision of the immigration laws, to with, defendants conducted a commercial operation in which defendants arranged sham marriages between United States citizens and aliens in order to assist the aliens in obtaining lawful permanent resident status in the United States, all for a fee.
